thread.title: Mets doing 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' guest appearance
thread.title_full: Mets doing 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' guest appearance | Newsday

author: VERNE GAY
title: Mets doing 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' guest appearance
text:
"Jimmy Kimmel Live," wrapping its weeklong stint in Brooklyn Friday, has some very special guests for this last show: the Mets.
The show just announced it, and unclear -- or at least unsaid -- is whether the entire team will be onstage at the Brooklyn Academy of Music's Howard Gilman Opera House ... but the stage is a big one. The entire team could easily be accommodated.
However, the Metsblog.com is saying: David Wright, Matt Harvey, Jacob deGrom and Wilmer Flores.
Here's what the program log says:
"Tonight the World Series-bound New York Mets will appear as guests on Jimmy Kimmel Live in Brooklyn to chat with Kimmel, a lifelong Mets fan."
TV Celebrities who love the Mets Howard Stern and Public Enemy will also help Kimmel wrap the week.
